entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:07 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
